question: How can artificial intelligence be used to improve urban planning, and generate an image of a futuristic smart city?

steps.content: How can artificial intelligence be used to improve urban planning, and generate an image of a futuristic smart city?

Can AI also help in reducing pollution in cities?

Searching for how AI can help reduce pollution in cities.
AI can help reduce pollution by optimizing energy use, managing waste efficiently, and monitoring air quality in real-time.
